request.description:
Here You Send In **Body** email and password and login with our user and you get a cookie in you browser called **X-Xsrf Token** and **Laravel_session**

that is alternative of token to add security layer

- **Payload**
    

all values are required except \`remember_me\`

if you enabled google captcha it's required also

response.name: User Logged In Successfully
response.body:
{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "admin",
        "phone": "201123456780",
        "status": 1,
        "email": null,
        "username": "admin",
        "avatar": "http://localhost:8000/storage/default/store.png",
        "type": "admin",
        "token": "5|4ujBT8TBwmWeV4W8xYaRh1J71bt4Vvgd40XBFVe5b9e5e9cc",
        "bio": null,
        "social_links": null
    },
    "message": "User logged in successfully",
    "type": "success",
    "code": 200,
    "showToast": true
}

formdata.description: used for firebase, pass it static now

formdata.description: must be unique and valid number
extensions are jpeg,png,jfif,jpg,webp and max size is 10MB

it's an array, pass it with index like ar[index] = value

- must be a valid url

response.name: Required Values
Unique Columns
